thread.title: The Trot's 8-mile route reminiscent of historic courses
thread.title_full: The Trot's 8-mile route reminiscent of historic courses | Dallas Morning News

author: Debbie Fetterman
title: The Trot's 8-mile route reminiscent of historic courses
text:
Veteran North Texas runners will again be running across the Trinity River on Thanksgiving Day. The Dallas YMCA Turkey Trot's 8-mile course will start and finish at City Hall, run past Reunion Park, across the Trinity River along the Houston Street Viaduct to Oak Cliff and back downtown along the Jefferson Street Viaduct.
"It's pretty much what it has been in the past," said the YMCA's Eddie Dobbins, Special Events Development Director. "We're thrilled. From the feedback we got last year, this was the preferred course."
